attributes.action: Reduce prison sentences by 6 months due to COVID-19 lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Due to COVID-19, Most prisoners have spent lockdown confined to their cells for 23 hours+ per day. This includes only being able to shower 3 times per week. This has been especially tough on this mental health.
attributes.background: Reduce prison sentences by 6 months due to prisoners spending much more time in solitary confinement and not being able to see loved ones which effects their mental health.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331465
